message: recipe_commands.id lacks default; inserts require explicit id

data.evidence: Insert failed: null value in column "id" violates not-null (code 23502)
data.implication: Must supply integer id manually when inserting commands

message: recipe_commands.id is UUID without default; must generate uuid4 client-side

data.evidence: Insert error 22P02 invalid input syntax for type uuid: "1"
data.action: Use uuid.uuid4() for id field on insert

message: Start command fails due to unique constraint on process_execution_state.execution_id

evidence: recipe_commands.status=error with error_message duplicate key unique_execution_state
